mapper.sql: t.IMGANNEXID, t.IMGANNEXTYPE, t.COMID, t.COMREGID, t.IMGANNEXNAME, t.IMGANNEXURL, t.IMGANNEXSTATUS, t.IMGANNEXREMARK, t.DATACLASSID, t.ADDUSERID, t.ADDTIME, t.NARROWIMGURL, t.FOLDERID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_IMGANNEX( IMGANNEXID , IMGANNEXTYPE , COMID , COMREGID , IMGANNEXNAME , IMGANNEXURL , IMGANNEXSTATUS , IMGANNEXREMARK , DATACLASSID , ADDUSERID , ADDTIME , NARROWIMGURL , FOLDERID ) VALUES ( #{imgannexid} , #{imgannextype} , #{comid} , #{comregid} , #{imgannexname} , #{imgannexurl} , #{imgannexstatus} , #{imgannexremark} , #{dataclassid} , #{adduserid} , #{addtime} , #{narrowimgurl} , #{folderid} )

INSERT INTO BASE_IMGANNEX ( IMGANNEXID , IMGANNEXTYPE , COMID , COMREGID , IMGANNEXNAME , IMGANNEXURL , IMGANNEXSTATUS , IMGANNEXREMARK , DATACLASSID , ADDUSERID , ADDTIME , NARROWIMGURL , FOLDERID ) VALUES
( #{item.imgannexid}, #{item.imgannextype}, #{item.comid}, #{item.comregid}, #{item.imgannexname}, #{item.imgannexurl}, #{item.imgannexstatus}, #{item.imgannexremark}, #{item.dataclassid}, #{item.adduserid}, #{item.addtime}, #{item.narrowimgurl}, #{item.folderid} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BASE_IMGANNEX
IMGANNEXTYPE = #{imgannextype},
COMID = #{comid},
COMREGID = #{comregid},
IMGANNEXNAME = #{imgannexname},
IMGANNEXURL = #{imgannexurl},
IMGANNEXSTATUS = #{imgannexstatus},
IMGANNEXREMARK = #{imgannexremark},
DATACLASSID = #{dataclassid},
ADDUSERID = #{adduserid},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
NARROWIMGURL = #{narrowimgurl},
FOLDERID = #{folderid},
WHERE IMGANNEXID = #{imgannexid}
mapper.insert:
insert into BASE_IMGANNEX ( IMGANNEXID, IMGANNEXTYPE, COMID, COMREGID, IMGANNEXNAME, IMGANNEXURL, NARROWIMGURL, FOLDERID, IMGANNEXSTATUS, ADDUSERID, ADDTIME ) select aa.id, aa.image_type, aa.org_id, aa.img_primary_id, file_name, img_original_url, img_thumb_url, folder_id, 1 IMGANNEXSTATUS, t.UserID, add_time from SYS_USER T inner join
select #{item.ID} id, #{item.imageType} image_type, #{item.orgId} org_id, #{item.imgPrimaryID} img_primary_id, #{item.fileName} file_name, #{item.imgOriginalUrl} img_original_url, #{item.imgThumbUrl} img_thumb_url, #{item.folderId} folder_id, sysdate add_time from dual aa on aa.org_id=t.orgid
